title: Looking for an Internship
body:
Hey there,

I am a final year university student that is looking to complete a 100 hour internship as part of my studies. I was hoping I could get in contact with somebody in which I could forward a CV and Resume. I study a Bachelor of Entertainment Industries at the Queensland University of Technology and being a long time player and fan of League of Legends I believe I could best attribute myself to an internship at Riot Game's OCE office.

I couldn't find myself an email to contact directly so I am posting here for hopes of a response and potential internship.

Thank you very much for your time,

Regards,
Matthew Davis

replies.body: Google > Riot Games > Careers. Provides you with all you need including a contact email.
